attributes.action: levy a windfall tax on banks that report excessive profits and offer huge dividends to shareholders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The major banks continue to apply punitive charges on customers, claiming the charges are necessary to cover costs. The same banks then report huge profits and offer exessive dividends to shareholders. We, the undersigned, believe that banks should be non-profit or even publically owned organizations. Failing that we believe that the banks should pay a significant tax levy to the benefit of the entire country.
